item.title: Alpinaraid Day 3
item.description: July 5th, 2022 : Our 205 climbed all the way up to 3000 m ! Col Basset - Sestri√®res - Lago Nero - Bardonecchia - Colle del Sommeillier - Rifugio Scarfiotti üìè Distance : 93 km (a little bit more with some detours) ‚õ∞Ô∏è Positive elevation : 4042 m (800 m more for the bonus mountain pass) Third day itinerary To be completely honest, day 3 itinerary read 93 km, but in reality we almost drove the double.
